ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:0.5_0: The second training rule on leaving
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.2_0: a trainee nun went to the nun Thullanandā and asked her for the full ordination.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.3_0: Thullanandā told her, “If you follow me for two years, Venerable, I’ll give you the full admission.” But she neither gave her the full admission, nor made any effort to have her fully admitted.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.4_0: That trainee nun told the nuns what had happened.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.5_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.6_0: “How could Venerable Thullanandāsay say this to a trainee nun,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.7_0: but then neither give her the full admission, nor make any effort to have her fully admitted?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.9_0: but then neither give her the full admission, nor make any effort to have her fully admitted?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.12_0: “... How could the nun Thullanandā act in this way?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.13_0: but then neither give her the full admission, nor make any effort to have her fully admitted?’
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.14_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.15_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.16.1_0: ‘If a nun tells a trainee nun, “If you follow me for two years, Venerable, I’ll give you the full admission,” but she then neither gives her the full admission nor makes any effort to have her fully admitted, then, if there was no obstruction, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.6_0: one training for two years in the six rules.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.7_0: “If you follow me for two years, Venerable”:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.10_0: I’ll give you the full ordination.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.11_0: Then, if there was no obstruction:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.14_0: does not herself give her the full admission.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.15_0: Nor makes any effort to have her fully admitted:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.16_0: she does not ask anyone else to take her away.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.17_0: If she thinks, “I’ll neither give her the full admission nor make any effort to have her fully admitted,” then by the mere fact of giving up her duty, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.18.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.20_0: if she searches, but does not find anyone to invite for correction;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.24_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.25_0: The eighth training rule is finished.
